svg.text: "Components connected end-to-end in a single path"

g.text: Same current flows through all components
RT = R₁ + R₂ + R₃ = 2 + 3 + 1 = 6Ω | I = V/RT = 12/6 = 2A

svg.text: • Same through all components: I = I₁ = I₂ = I₃
• Divides across components: V = V₁ + V₂ + V₃
• Always greater than largest individual R
"Components connected side-by-side with common connection points"
• Same across all branches: V = V₁ = V₂ = V₃
• Divides among branches: IT = I₁ + I₂ + I₃
• Always less than smallest individual R
• Each device has its own switch
• One component failure doesn't affect others
• Need same current through all components
• Need same voltage across all components
• Check power ratings of all components
